name: Beacon
description: Fight through a randomly generated alien world you've crash landed on to locate your Beacon and signal for rescue. With the help of your Clone Bay and DNA collected from defeated enemies, mutate yourself to victory.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
